subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Of the 255 players selected in last year’s N.F.L. draft, only three were taken after Saints receiver Marques Colston, who led all first-year receivers with eight touchdowns in the regular season.
snippet: Of the 255 players selected in last year’s N.F.L. draft, only three were taken after Saints receiver Marques Colston, who led all first-year receivers with eight touchdowns in the regular season.
